name: BIDSConverter
description: Converts arbitrary file collection containing one subject's data into BIDS format

inputs.name: Input
inputs.description: Input file collection containing all subject data.

inputs.name: Subject number
inputs.description:
Subject number.
If not declared, will try to extract from input folder name.

inputs.name: Session identifiers
inputs.description:
Strings indentifying sessions.
Enclose multiple strings in curly braces {}, and separate with commas (no spaces).
If different modalities identify sessions with different strings, add equivalent sets after a semicolon (;).

inputs.name: Task identifiers
inputs.description:
Strings indentifying tasks.
Enclose multiple strings in curly braces {}, and separate with commas (no spaces).
If different modalities identify tasks with different strings, add equivalent sets after a semicolon (;).

inputs.name: T1W identifiers
inputs.description: Shell-type expressions identifying T1W images. Enclose multiple expressions in braces {} and separate with commas (,).

inputs.name: BOLD data identifiers
inputs.description: Shell-type expressions identifying BOLD images. Enclose multiple expressions in braces {} and separate with commas (,).

inputs.name: Physiological recording identifiers
inputs.description: Shell-type expressions identifying physiological recordings. Enclose multiple expressions in braces {} and separate with commas (,).

inputs.name: Compression flag (for testing)
inputs.description: Check this to skip file compression. Useful for saving time during testing.
